docs.text: 'm trying to connect an hp aio wirelessly to the home network supported by the pace gateway/router. the printer "looks" for 2 minutes and never finds the signal which is located 20 feet away. how do i to turn off wps in pace 5268ac router temporarily so that the printer can find the signal. in wi-fi config, there is an error status in the enable/disable drop down. any help would be appreciated.

docs.title: Need to pay bill and get tech support
docs.text: hllo,i am trying to pay my bill because my service has been interrupted. i received an email saying i had until april 1st to pay without a restore fee. i have had a terrible time navigating your customer service and billing lines to pay. 60% of the time, i wait on hold for 20 minutes just to end up transferred to the wrong department. another 40% of my calls are hung up on. i am extremely frustrated by the lack of professionalism and knowledge amongst the phone operators.i also have a technical problem, being that i receive only 1-2.5 mbps speed while i am paying for 6 mbps. i made several technical support inquiries previously and a technician came out saying there was nothing they could do to help. i do not feel that i should be paying for high speed internet when i am getting the slowest speed possible. they do not recognize my earlier support calls because my account number was changed when i dropped my landline that i never agreed to sign up for.please help me pay my bill and get it discounted since i am not getting the speed i am paying for. i have spent hours on the phone trying to get help and am beyond frustrated with the operators and the mess. if this does not get resolved, i will be leaving wwireless and filing a complaint with the bbb.thank you,monica kelly

docs.title: switchers program and customer service issues!!!!
docs.text: only had a month left on my contract with verizon and i lost my phone and heard about this switchers program, so i went to wwireless store and asked them about details about this program (they did not tell me that info exisit on the web) because i had to buy a new phone (was debating whether i should just buy a crappy phone and trade in or get a nice phone and just stay on the contract then sell the phone and get a new phone at wwireless) with but they told me that i could buy an unlocked phone then switch over to wwireless and bring that phone to wwireless and use the same phone. so i did, then i was denied for switchers credit because i did not turn in my phone.... so i went to the same store and told the manager the situation, and he tells me, all he can do is discipline that person who told me wrong info?!!!!! isn't it wwireless's responsible for giving out wrong info and make me switch over with wrong procedures?! i could either waited that 1 month then switch over to whereever or buy a crappy phone and made that switch!! they provided me with wrong info and made me go through all this and now they are saying oops! sorry?!!! and it is not even 1 visit and got this wrong info, i went there multiple times to figure this situation out and went through all these steps with me along the way and not one single person told me it was wrong and made this mess and now i am the only person who is responsible this situation?!!!

docs.title: Samsung S7 edge Hotspot problems
docs.text: here is no issue with the hardware. purchased the edge in oct. '16. there were no issues with the device. hotspot worked with 0 issues.once i received the latest update from wwireless, the phone would not turn on the mobile hotspot. i would review my package to ensure that i still have data left on my gophone plan... there are gbs left.3 days in a row, i had to call tech support to add on some feature, switch my mobile data on and off... and it would work... for the day.the reasons which was given is that the internet service on the main plan is depleted and even with the purchase of additional data this would happen.i will submit that since i purchased the device, and when i used the galaxy note, for 3 years, that never happened and was never an issue.the solution which was given only solves the symptoms and not the problem, especially when you have to call in multiple times for the issue.

docs.title: Unlock request approved but the code could not use
docs.text: got a message about your request was approved. but i could not use the unlock code.congratulations! your request was approvedimei: *****request number: *****hi, ......we received and approved your request to unlock your huawei h1611 device. use the unlock code and instructions in this email to unlock your device.unlock code:*****instructions: "1. power off the device.2. insert any non-wwireless sim card. (the customer cannot unlock using an wwireless sim card).3. power on and the device prompts for the unlock code.4. enter the unlock code.5. press ok."for more information about unlocking a device, check out our device unlock support page.thanks for choosing us,wwireless[edited for privacy-please do not post personal or unique information such as but not limited to full names, employee id numbers, email addresses, phone numbers, account numbers, etc.]

docs.title: how can i unlock my phone?
docs.text: h,i wrote my email to wwireless like this:dear,i got iphone 6s that is a gift from my friend, but its locked.i heard wwireless can unlock iphone off-contract.so can you help me check my iphone can unlock?my imei:*****i cant call wwireless service bacause im living in vietnam.look forward to hearing from you.with my best regardstun *****but i received the receipt:wwirelessention!! process update!!effective friday august 12, 2016; please contact retail support team bydialing *aid on your cou or wwireless phone (myc_ope_sal_ret_370187) and theywill assist you with all your buyer's remorse needs.see updated mycsp article: myc_hom_sls_sap_106107 for detailsyour request has not been resolved due to this recent process change.thank you, wwirelessi can't find:myc_hom_sls_sap_106107now how can i find this or what can i sent other?please understand that my english is not good. i'm sorry about that.please tell me.thank you!tun [edited for privacy-please do not post personal or unique information such as but not limited to full names, employee id numbers, email addresses, phone numbers, account numbers, etc.]

docs.title: Lock screen unresponsive after restart or power off
docs.text: smsung go prime phone lock screen unresponsive for longer than an hour after i restart or power off device ( powering off because apps crashing) to reset app use to work fine i would turn it off wait a few minutes turn it on it would take a couple minutes to reboot and then i was off and running. but for the last two days when i try to restart or power up it like freezes but not exactly. i can see the wwireless stuff up top that says i have service and that my wifi is connected. but when i enter my pin it just does not unlock not error just nothing if i enter the wrong pin it says incorrect pin. any assistance you can offer would be appreciated i tried using the troubleshooter on the wwireless website but it doesn't work with gophones!!!!

docs.title: S7 Google maps voice no longer working
docs.text: ecently (post update ithink) i noticed that the navigation voice no longer works when i'm in my car. the phone is connected to the car via bt. the voice used to come from the phone's speaker before. i scoured the phone for some setting that would turn the maps voice off, but nothing.then the other day while driving with google maps navigating me i received a phone call. this of course comes over my car's stereo, but suddenly i heard the navigation voice over the car's speakers! so it appears the phone is now sending the nav voice to the car via bt instead of playing the voice from the phone, but the car only plays it when it is pushing the phone to the car stereo during phone call. any advice?

docs.title: Shoddy service, Ineffectual Customer Service, Customer Loyalty & Supervisors are a JOKE
docs.text: m home land line and both cell phones have had spotty (at best) or completely non-existent service since late january. we've been at this location with wwireless for 12 years with only the occasional hiccup. i've now spent over 9 hours in 4 different chats - with 4 cases being opened - and wwireless has done nothing. my husband uses his cell for work - we are losing work calls daily.won't be long before i just move everything to verizon. i checked them last night. they have 4g lte at this location, will upgrade my phone for free (yes, free - checked on 3/5/17), get me unlimited talk/text/data and my bill will be less.i am sick and tired of the wwireless runaround, lack of service and outright robbery (you are supposed to provide 4g lte here and cannot do so).

docs.title: Not happy with customer service today!!
docs.text: called wwireless today to get my bill lowered because i have been with you all for 20 years and no one told me about unlimited data and i've been having overage charges for the past three months. the first lady that i talk to helped me a whole lot but she said i had to talk to customer service because of the fact that i get a discount with the postal service and i won't get that anymore if i change my plan. so i called back and i waited 10 minutes on hold till i get a guy named michael with customer service he did not explain anything to me he said everything was changed everything was done i told him i understood i would not get the discount and everything was supposed to be finished and he was very rude! we got off the phone i thought everything was taken care of then i get home and i start getting messages saying i'm going over my data again so i call back wait for 15 minutes to get a spanish-speaking woman which i'm not mexican so i barely could understand her but she got the plan changed for me!! hopefully i do not have to call back again hopefully everything is changed the way it is supposed to be changed!! you think since i've been a customer with you for over 20 years that you would let me know about unlimited data instead of me having to call and find out!!

docs.title: iPhone 6+ Unlock error
docs.text: can't unlock my iphone 6 (which is out of contract) because wwireless claim the imei number dosn't match a compatible device. this is the error message that i have been getting 3 times in a row:"your unlock request was denied because the imei number doesnt match a device thats compatible with the wwireless network.check the imei number by dialing *#06#, or check the device settings, and then submit a new request."this is of course nonsense, since i have been using my iphone on the wwireless network for 2 years. i triple checked the imei number and it is correct. the device gives me the same correct number either when i look it up through device settings or when i dial *#06#. this iphone - purchased through best buy and activated through wwireless - was on a 2-year plan and is now paid off.i really need to unlock this phone. customer service can't or won't help. why can't this issue not be fixed by a simple phone call?thanks in advance for any help.trupti

docs.title: Ticket Tuesdays very misleading and deceptive

docs.title: Problems with billing
docs.text: w just switched over to wwireless and have had nothing but problems. we got ebills when we told them we want paper bills. when we finally got a paper mobile bill the next time, it was two weeks past the due date. we never even got the internet/directtv bills. when we did finally get it, we called that day to tell them we would be paying it the next day and why it wasn't paid. we came home that night to our service being turned off and now being told we will be charged $130+ dollars to restore it. i can't pay something i don't get, especially when it is first one. we set up everything to autopay per bill pay but i have to have at least one bill to set it up. we called wwireless and the guy never said a word about it being cut off. we would have paid it right then if he had even bothered to do his job and be a customer service rep! the bill is also $170 instead of the $110 we were quoted. we have had constant trouble with the directtv with interrupted service since we switched over. this switch has been a nightmare and i am starting to wonder if the business model is a switch/bate to get you over bc now i am paying more and then purposeful actions to create late fees and extra charges.

docs.title: Teen had iphone stolen- No insurance. Options?

docs.title: unlock request still pending from February 28th
docs.text: unlck request still pending from february 28th, cannot make another request becuase it says that i have a pending request.any help would be appreciated.

docs.title: Annoyed!!!!!
docs.text: or the past 2 weeks my phone has decided that it wants me to download every app available from mobile strike to quickbooks! i don't want them or need them and if i did, i'm smart enough to go and find them myself! at various times throughout the days, and well into the evening too, especially after i've gone to bed or an hour before i wake up, i get my phone which has been sleeping for hours, as well, starts playing a mobile strike commercial, very annoying! last night was mobile strike at 11:30pm ( went to sleep at 10) and then at 4:30 this morning ( an hour before my alarm went off), very sick and tired of this nonsense! i've shut down just about any app that can produce an ad, but they just keep on playing! i use my phone for business and when i go to do something and am sidetracked by this nonsense, it's irritating! does anyone have any idea if this is some type of virus, do i need to erase every app that i've downloaded since i got this phone 1 and a half months ago?

docs.title: unlocking a phone for use on another carrier
docs.text: his is not really so much a question, as a complaint. i fail to see how it can take two weeks to unlock a phone that yu want to use owith another carrier. it certainly doesnt take but a second for them to shut the crap down! the guy at the wwireless store said 2 or 3 days. well aparently since its no longer activated with wwireless, it will take much longer. what a crock. i should just take this 800 dollar new phone back, and get rid of wwireless once and for all.

docs.title: Contact Pictures no longer appear when text comes through S7
docs.text: have an s7 and just did the big update about a week ago. ever since the update, whenever i get a text the contact picture ( or first letter of their name if not picture was wwirelessached ) no longer shows up in the preview screen. i do not have the preview of the text showing, but if i were to get a text while doing something else, the picture of the letter would pop up. does anyone know how to fix this? the picture and letters are still in the text messages while texting, just not when the text comes through.

docs.title: Unlock request denied X 2
docs.text: have made 2 requests to unlock my wwireless branded htc one via the unlock portal. i am not, nor have i been, an wwireless wireless customer. i bought this phone used on craigslist. i checked the imei prior to buying, so i know it's not blacklisted. i used this phone on the cricket network for about 2 months, and didn't require an unlock, but now i'm moving to a different gsm carrier. each denial was given a different reason, but i'm not giving up. please help.

docs.title: lost phone FOUND!!
docs.text: thought my samsung galaxy s6 had been stolen, well come to find out... i guess i just misplaced it (they said it's the first thing to go)! so, i called and reported it stolen.  then, one day, while cleaning out a drawer what do i see.... there it is in that dark old drawer.  i was so excited..... thinking ahh i will have it "reinstated"and all will be good. i search hi & low.... looking for someone, anyone.... and i called and called.... and no one in wwirelessland would remove my phone from this list of stolen phones. what to do? where to go? anyone???

docs.title: suspended service
docs.text: have been a paying customer of at & t since september, 2015. 3phones and a tablet. now suddently i am 1 day late and my service is suspended, i have spent time with customer service trying to get my pay date changed or take a check over the phone for a future day, now just 8 days from now. if you review my account you would see that my payments are made on or near the 15th of every month. i am just dumbfounded at the lack of empathy when the customer makes every effort to advise of the situation and are basically slapped in the face for their efforts.

docs.title: New Plans
docs.text: 've noticed that the new plans advertise that they cost less money than the old plans and come with a few discounts. but when you speak to a customer service rep, the new plans cost more, (like so much more they should rewrite their ad) and the only offered discount is for military (totally awesome that they offer discounts to military) and none of these things are made clear in any of the online or tv ads, just by the reps when you ask about purchasing a new plan... is that not false advertising and isn't false advertising illegal?

docs.title: Better Rates
docs.text: have been a customer of wwireless i was grandfathered in from cingular wireless. i currently have 5 lines plus the wsatellite option, i currently pay well over 500.00 a month for cell phone service, and no mwwirelesser what the sercice seems to increase every month!! this is getting to be ridiculous, my cell phone is higher than my car pmt, i need a cheaper rate, or i have no choice but to leave wwireless. i feel that wwireless should offer more of a feasible plan or discounted rates for long term customer's something such as customer appreciation. like i said 1000.00 for cell phone service is nonsense!!!

docs.title: New Jersey sales tax
docs.text: wh is wwireless still charging 7% new jersey sales tax in march 2017? on january 1, 2017, new jersey reduced its sales tax to 6.875%.

docs.title: Unlimited plans
docs.text: have been with wwireless for many years and we are currently on the wwireless next unlimited plan with 4 phones. is anyone else upset that we are paying $40 per line (total is $120 with 4th line discount) and the new unlimited choice is $20 per line ($80 total) + $10 off a month if you are on autopay and paperless billing (which iam but do not get $10 off)? i have called wwireless 3 times to see if my billing can be reduced to $20 a line but was denied 3 times. i'm really considering switching mycarrier to sprint to cut my bill in half!

docs.title: Support for separate billing for phones and network charges
docs.text: pay for four wireless phone lines with wwireless. my kids want to keep upgrading phones, and i would like to have them get the monthly billing for their phones, while i pay for the network charges as well as my wife and my own phones. it doesn't seem that wwireless supports this function, which seems something that is pretty easy to accomplish. is my understanding correct? if so, is there a reason that wwireless doesn't offer this function? thank you.

docs.title: Unlocking an iPhone 5s
docs.text: rying to unlock my idle iphone 5s. i am getting the denial that it is currently active on another customers account. it was temporarily in use for less than 2 days at the time of first request but then the sim was removed and the phone is idle again, but a subsequent request a day after the sim removal was denied again for the same reason.how long i have to wait now after the sim was taken out before the system would recognize that it is not in use ? it meets all other eligibility requirements for unlocking.please advise.thanks

docs.title: Told wrong information from an AT&T employee that resulted in an ETF
docs.text: recently upgraded my wwireless u-verse and internet when my contract was expiring back in january. i was offered a (free) tablet (with a one time fee of $45, so much for free). i then asked the wwireless (i believe to be trained by wwireless) employee if there was any monthly fees. his response was no (i saved the online conversation (email transcript)) as proof of his response. a few days go by and i noticed a $10 wireless fee on my bill. i called and spoke to someone and said i was told there would be no monthly fees and i would like to cancel. at no point in time did she inform me that there was a $150 etf. check the recording of our conversation. a few weeks go by and now i notice i have a $367 bill. i call and spend 1.5 hours on the phone, i was told i would get a call back in a few days i'm still waiting on that call back. i went to two different wwireless stores no help there and another wasted 3 hours of my time. i call again and just keep getting bounced around from department to department. this guy says he will call me back again no call. i call again last week the women says she will handle it and she will be the last person i talk to about this, well it's been another five days and no call back. why do you treat your paying customers like this? is this how to do good business? i have proof that one of your employees told me there would be no monthly and then there ended up being a monthly fee. if i was told the correct information the first time i would of never renewed my service with wwireless. if this issue doesn't get resolved at the end of my contract i will no longer be a wwireless customer and i will tell all my family and friends about this situation and to avoid your service at all cost.

docs.title: Eligible for Unlock -- ATT won't Unlock
docs.text: bought my galaxy s6 from wwireless. my contract was completed in november 2016. i am eligible for unlock. i have not upgraded by phone.the unlock portal refuses to unlock my phone. it tells me i recently upgraded.i contacted wireless customer sevice. they agree that i did not recently upgrade and should be able to unlock. i started a case. the result of the case was an email telling me i was not eligible to unlock because i recently upgraded.i called in, and started a second case. this time it was supposedly "escalated" with "backup documentation." yesterday, i again received an email telling me i was not eligible to unlock because i recntly upgraded.very frustrating. several wwireless reps and i all agree i have not recntly upgraded and i am eliglble to unlock, but wwireless will not unlock. what can i do?

docs.title: Visual Voicemail to Text
docs.text: have the samsung s7. when i was on verizon the visual voicemail had option to see text transcription. however now with wwireless (same phone model) i no longer have the text transcription option. can you please advise how i can get it? wwireless support says only supported on "some" phones.... if verizon supported it on this model... why doesn't wwireless?
